about.title: Jos√© Manuel Torres Mena
about.description: I am a Junior developer with a web development certificate, with training in video game development and microcomputer systems and networks. I really like Backend and Frontend. I have done several projects with Express.js and also with Vue.js.

descriptions.html5: Certified in Web Development and Learned in Microcomputer Systems Degree
descriptions.css3: Certified in Web Development and Learned in Microcomputer Systems Degree
descriptions.vuerouter: Handling dynamic and nested routes with Vue Router.
descriptions.axios: HTTP client for easily consuming REST APIs.
descriptions.git: Version control and collaboration on projects.

experiences.html5: I started with HTML in 2018, creating small web pages.
experiences.css3: I started with CSS in 2018, styling small web pages.
experiences.javascript: I started with JavaScript in 2024, building multiple APIs.
experiences.vuejs: I started with Vue in 2024, working on a game project.
experiences.nodejs: I started with Node in 2024, building different projects.
